entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Rain at times mixed with snow beginning late this evening and ending before morning then partly cloudy. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm over higher terrain. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022
